letters.description: Perform a holistic intake of bio-psycho-social factors affecting sexual health and client objectives.
Deliver clinical insights into sexual function, anatomy, and the physiology of arousal.
Cultivate interoceptive focus to bridge the gap between physical sensation and mental presence.
Facilitate cognitive exploration of sexual scripts, core beliefs, and emotional blocks to pleasure.
Enhance intimacy through assertive communication, boundary work, and emotional vulnerability.
Solidify sexual agency and the integration of sustainable wellness practices into daily life.
